description: B6Zip is free software distributed under the GPL v2 license. The utility supports a large variety of compression methods, such as LZMA, LZMA2, Deflate, BZip2, and PPMD.

The B6Z format uses the LZMA2 compression method by default. Some of the features of the B6Z format include open architecture, high compression ratio, metadata compression, and state of the art AES-256 encryption.
